ORIGAM Documentation : Charts

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Feb 13, 2019

You can easily implement chart visualization of data in your ORIGAM application. Any screen section can add a Chart View.

You can define the following types of charts - Cartesian Charts, Pie Charts and SVG Charts.
